程序包 net.minecraftforge.fluids

类 BlockFluidBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry.Impl<Block>
      • net.minecraft.block.Block
        • net.minecraftforge.fluids.BlockFluidBase
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IFluidBlock, IForgeRegistryEntry<Block>
    直接已知子类:
    BlockFluidClassic, BlockFluidFinite
    public abstract class BlockFluidBase
extends Block
implements IFluidBlock
    This is a base implementation for Fluid blocks. It is highly recommended that you extend this class or one of the Forge-provided child classes.

        protected final Fluid definedFluid
        This is the fluid used in the constructor. Use this reference to configure things like icons for your block. It might not be active in the registry, so do NOT expose it.

      • getBlockFaceShape

        @Nonnull
public BlockFaceShape getBlockFaceShape​(@Nonnull
                                        IBlockAccess worldIn,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        IBlockState state,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        BlockPos pos,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        EnumFacing face)
        从类复制的说明: Block
        Get the geometry of the queried face at the given position and state. This is used to decide whether things like buttons are allowed to be placed on the face, or how glass panes connect to the face, among other things.

        Common values are SOLID, which is the default, and UNDEFINED, which represents something that does not fit the other descriptions and will generally cause other things not to connect to the face.

        覆盖:
        getBlockFaceShape 在类中 Block
        返回:
        an approximation of the form of the given face

      • getFilledPercentage

        public float getFilledPercentage​(World world,
                                 BlockPos pos)
        从接口复制的说明: IFluidBlock
        Returns the amount of a single block is filled. Value between 0 and 1. 1 meaning the entire 1x1x1 cube is full, 0 meaning completely empty. If the return value is negative. It will be treated as filling the block from the top down instead of bottom up.
        指定者:
        getFilledPercentage 在接口中 IFluidBlock
        返回:

      • getFilledPercentage

        public float getFilledPercentage​(IBlockAccess world,
                                 BlockPos pos)

      • getFogColor

        public Vec3d getFogColor​(World world,
                         BlockPos pos,
                         IBlockState state,
                         Entity entity,
                         Vec3d originalColor,
                         float partialTicks)
        从类复制的说明: Block
        Use this to change the fog color used when the entity is "inside" a material. Vec3d is used here as "r/g/b" 0 - 1 values.
        覆盖:
        getFogColor 在类中 Block
        参数:
        world - The world.
        pos - The position at the entity viewport.
        state - The state at the entity viewport.
        entity - the entity
        originalColor - The current fog color, You are not expected to use this, Return as the default if applicable.
        返回:
        The new fog color.

      • getStateAtViewpoint

        public IBlockState getStateAtViewpoint​(IBlockState state,
                                       IBlockAccess world,
                                       BlockPos pos,
                                       Vec3d viewpoint)
        从类复制的说明: Block
        Used to determine the state 'viewed' by an entity (see ActiveRenderInfo.getBlockStateAtEntityViewpoint(World, Entity, float)). Can be used by fluid blocks to determine if the viewpoint is within the fluid or not.
        覆盖:
        getStateAtViewpoint 在类中 Block
        参数:
        state - the state
        world - the world
        pos - the position
        viewpoint - the viewpoint
        返回:
        the block state that should be 'seen'

      • getBlockLiquidHeight

        public float getBlockLiquidHeight​(World world,
                                  BlockPos pos,
                                  IBlockState state,
                                  Material material)
        从类复制的说明: Block
        Called when entities are swimming in the given liquid and returns the relative height (used by EntityBoat)
        覆盖:
        getBlockLiquidHeight 在类中 Block
        参数:
        world - world that is being tested.
        pos - block thats being tested.
        state - state at world/pos
        material - liquid thats being tested.
        返回:
        relative height of the given liquid (material), a value between 0 and 1
